GV02gopthbru:3: oṃ brahma ha vā idam agra āsīt svayaṃ tv ekam eva tad aikṣata mahad vai yakṣaṃ tad
GV02gopthbru:4: ekam evāsmi hantāhaṃ mad eva manmātraṃ dvitīyaṃ devaṃ nirmama iti tad abhyaśrāmyad
GV02gopthbru:5: abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya lalāṭe sneho yad ārdryam
GV02gopthbru:6: ājāyata tenānandat tam abravīt mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti /
GV02gopthbru:7: tad yad abravīt mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti tasmāt suvedo 'bhavattaṃ vā etaṃ suvedaṃ santaṃ sveda ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:8: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // GpBr_1,1.1 //
GV02gopthbru:9: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya sarvebhyo romagartebhyaḥ pṛthak svedadhārāḥ prāsyandanta
GV02gopthbru:10: tābhir anandat tad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir
GV02gopthbru:11: vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti /
GV02gopthbru:12: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāt dhārā abhavaṃs taddhārāṇāṃ dhārātvaṃ yac cāsu dhriyate /
GV02gopthbru:13: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāj jāyā
GV02gopthbru:14: abhavaṃs tajjāyānāṃ jāyātvaṃ yac cāsu puruṣo jāyate yac ca putraḥ punnāmanarakam
GV02gopthbru:15: anekaśatatāraṃ tasmāt trāti putras tat putrasya putratvam /
GV02gopthbru:16: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmād āpo 'bhavaṃs tad apām aptvam āpnoti vai sa sarvān kāmān yān kāmayate
GV02gopthbru:17: tā apaḥ sṛṣṭvānvaikṣata tāsu svāṃ chāyām apaśyat tām asyekṣamāṇasya svayaṃ reto 'skandat
GV02gopthbru:18: tad apsu pratyatiṣṭhat tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tāḥ śrāntās taptāḥ
GV02gopthbru:19: saṃtaptāḥ sārdham eva retasā dvaidham abhavaṃs tāsām anyā anyatarā atilavaṇā apeyā
GV02gopthbru:20: asvādvyas tā aśāntā retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhann athetarāḥ peyāḥ svādvyaḥ śāntās
GV02gopthbru:21: tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyo
GV02gopthbru:22: yad reta āsīt tad abhṛjjyata yad abhṛjjyata tasmād bhṛguḥ samabhavat tad bhṛgor bhṛgutvaṃ
GV02gopthbru:23: bhṛgur iva vai sa sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda // GpBr_1,1.3 //
GV02gopthbru:24: sa bhṛguṃ sṛṣṭvāntaradhīyata sa bhṛguḥ sṛṣṭaḥ prāṅ ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāyo vāyo
GV02gopthbru:25: iti saṃnyavartata sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat mātariśvan mātariśvann
GV02gopthbru:26: iti sa nyavartata sa pratīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat pavamānaḥ pavamāna iti
GV02gopthbru:27: sa nyavartata sa udīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāta vāteti tam abravīn nanv
GV02gopthbru:28: avidāmaha iti na hīty athārvāṅ enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad yad abravīd athārvāṅ
GV02gopthbru:29: enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad atharvābhavat tad atharvaṇo 'tharvatvam /
GV02gopthbru:30: tasya ha vā etasya bhagavato 'tharvaṇa ṛṣer yatheva brahmaṇī lomāni yathāṅgāni yathā
GV02gopthbru:31: prāṇa evam evāsya sarva ātmā samabhavat tam atharvāṇaṃ brahmābravīt prajāpateḥ prajāḥ
GV02gopthbru:33: tad yad abravīt prajāpateḥ prajā sṛṣṭvā pālayasveti tasmāt prajāpatir abhavat tat
GV02gopthbru:34: prajāpateḥ prajāpatitvam atharvā vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatir iva vai sa sarveṣu lokeṣu
GV02gopthbru:36: tam atharvāṇam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptāt
GV02gopthbru:37: daśatayān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn niramimataikarcān dvyṛcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān
GV02gopthbru:39: tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:40: saṃtaptebhyaḥ daśatayān ātharvaṇān ārṣeyān niramimataikādaśān dvādaśāṃs trayodaśāṃś
GV02gopthbru:41: caturdaśān pañcadaśān ṣoḍaśān saptadaśān aṣṭādaśān navadaśān viṃśān iti /
GV02gopthbru:42: tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn ātharvaṇāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:43: śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyat sa ātharvaṇo vedo 'bhavat
GV02gopthbru:44: tam ātharvaṇaṃ vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād
GV02gopthbru:45: om iti mana evordhvam akṣaram udakrāmat sa ya icchet sarvair etair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇī
GV02gopthbru:47: sarvair ha vā asyaitair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇaiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.5
GV02gopthbru:48: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyad bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa ātmata eva trīṃl lokān niramimata pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ divam iti /
GV02gopthbru:49: sa khalu pādābhyām eva pṛthivīṃ niramimatodarād antarikṣam mūrdhno divam /
GV02gopthbru:50: sa tāṃs trīn lokān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas trīn devān niramimatāgniṃ vāyum ādityam iti
GV02gopthbru:51: sa khalu pṛthivyā evāgniṃ niramimatāntarikṣād vāyuṃ diva ādityam /
GV02gopthbru:52: sa tāṃs trīn devān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:53: saṃtaptebhyas trīn vedān niramimata ṛgvedaṃ yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam iti agne ṛgvedaṃ
GV02gopthbru:55: sa tāṃs trīn vedān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas tisro mahāvyāhṛtīr niramimata bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti /
GV02gopthbru:56: bhūr ity ṛgvedāt bhuva iti yajurvedāt svar iti sāmavedāt /
GV02gopthbru:57: sa ya icchet sarvair etais tribhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ
GV02gopthbru:58: kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitais tribhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ
GV02gopthbru:59: vidvān evam etābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurute // GpBr_1,1.6 //
GV02gopthbru:60: tā yā amū retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tāḥ prācyo dakṣiṇācyaḥ pratīcya udīcyaḥ samavadravanta /
GV02gopthbru:61: tad yat samavadravanta tasmāt samudra ucyate /
GV02gopthbru:62: tā bhītā abruvan bhagavantam eva vayaṃ rājānaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti /
GV02gopthbru:63: yac ca vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tadvaraṇo 'bhavat taṃ vā etaṃ varaṇaṃ santaṃ varuṇa ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:64: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ /
GV02gopthbru:65: sa samudrād amucyata sa mucyur abhavat taṃ vā etaṃ mucyuṃ santaṃ mṛtyur ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:66: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ /
GV02gopthbru:67: taṃ varuṇaṃ mṛtyum abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya
GV02gopthbru:68: sarvebhyo 'ṅgebhyo raso 'kṣarat so 'ṅgaraso 'bhavat taṃ vā etam aṅgarasaṃ santam
GV02gopthbru:70: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // GpBr_1,1.7 //
GV02gopthbru:71: tam aṅgirasam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād
GV02gopthbru:72: viṃśino 'ṅgirasa ṛṣīn niramimata tān viṃśino 'ṅgirasa ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat
GV02gopthbru:73: samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo daśatayān āṅgirasān ārṣeyān
GV02gopthbru:74: niramimata ṣoḍaśino 'ṣṭādaśino dvādaśina ekarcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān
GV02gopthbru:76: tān aṅgirasa ṛṣīn āṅgirasāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas
GV02gopthbru:77: taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyatsa āṅgiraso vedo 'bhavat tam āṅgirasaṃ
GV02gopthbru:78: vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptāj janad iti
GV02gopthbru:80: sa ya icchet sarvair etair aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś ca kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtyā
GV02gopthbru:81: kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitair aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya eva veda
GV02gopthbru:82: yaś caiva vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.8 //
GV02gopthbru:83: sa ūrdhvo 'tiṣṭhat sa imāṃl lokān vyaṣṭabhnāt tasmād aṅgiraso 'dhīyāna ūrdhvas tiṣṭhati
GV02gopthbru:84: tad vrataṃ sa manasā dhyāyed yad vā ahaṃ kiṃcana manasā dhyāsyāmi tathaiva tad bhaviṣyati
GV02gopthbru:87: śreṣṭho ha vedas tapaso 'dhijāto brahmajyānāṃ kṣitaye saṃbabhūva ṛjyad bhūtaṃ yad asṛjyatedaṃ niveśanam anṛṇaṃ dūram asyeti /
GV02gopthbru:88: tā vā etā aṅgirasāṃ yāmayo yan menayaḥ karoti menibhir vīryaṃ ya eva veda // GpBr_1,1.9 //
GV02gopthbru:89: sa diśau 'nvaikṣata prācīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pratīcīm udīcīṃ dhruvām ūrdhvām iti /
GV02gopthbru:90: tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ pañca vedān niramimata sarpavedaṃ piśācavedam asuravedam itihāsavedaṃ purāṇavedam iti /
GV02gopthbru:91: sa khalu prācyā eva diśaḥ sarpavedaṃ niramimata dakṣiṇasyāḥ piśācavedaṃ pratīcyā asuravedam udīcyā itihāsavedaṃ dhruvāyāś cordhvāyāś ca purāṇavedam
GV02gopthbru:92: sa tān pañca vedān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyaḥ pañca mahāvyāhṛtīr niramimata vṛdhat karad guhan mahat tad iti /
GV02gopthbru:93: vṛdhad iti sarpavedāt karad iti piśācavedāt guhad ity asuravedāt mahad itītihāsavedāt
GV02gopthbru:94: tad iti purāṇavedāt sa ya icchet sarvair etaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir
GV02gopthbru:95: eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati
GV02gopthbru:96: ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurute // GpBr_1,1.10 //
GV02gopthbru:97: sa āvataś ca parāvataś cānvaikṣata tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ śam ity ūrdhvam akṣaram udakrāmat /
GV02gopthbru:98: sa ya icchet sarvābhir etābhir āvadbhiś ca parāvadbhiś ca kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ
GV02gopthbru:99: mahāvyāhṛtyā kurvīta sarvābhir ha vā asyaitābhir āvadbhiś ca parāvadbhiś ca kṛtaṃ
GV02gopthbru:100: bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.11 //
GV02gopthbru:101: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyat bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa manasa eva candramasaṃ
GV02gopthbru:102: niramimata nakhebhyo nakṣatrāṇi lomabhya oṣadhivanaspatīn kṣudrebhyaḥ prāṇebhyo 'nyān bahūn devān /
GV02gopthbru:103: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa etaṃ trivṛtaṃ saptatantum ekaviṃśatisaṃsthaṃ yajñam apaśyat /
GV02gopthbru:106: athāpy eṣa prākrīḍitaḥ ślokaḥ pratyabhivadati sapta sutyāḥ sapta ca pākayajñā iti // GpBr_1,1.12 //
GV02gopthbru:107: tam āharat yenāyajata tasyāgnir hotāsīt vāyur adhvaryuḥ sūrya udgātā candramā brahmā
GV02gopthbru:108: parjanyaḥ sadasya oṣadhivanaspatayaś camasā adhvaryavo viśvedevā hotrakā atharvāṅgiraso
GV02gopthbru:109: goptāras taṃ ha smaitam evaṃ vidvāṃsaḥ pūrve śrotriyā yajñaṃ tataṃ sāvasāya ha smāhety
GV02gopthbru:110: abhivrajanti mā no 'yaṃ gharma udyataḥ pramattānām amṛtāḥ prajāḥ prasākṣīd iti tān
GV02gopthbru:111: vāyetān parirakṣakān sadaḥprasarpakān ity ācakṣate dakṣiṇāsamṛddhāṃs tad u ha smāha
GV02gopthbru:112: prajāpatir yad vai yajñe 'kuśalā ṛtvijo bhavanty acaritino brahmacaryam aparāgyā
GV02gopthbru:113: vā tad vai yajñasya viriṣṭam ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:114: yajñasya viriṣṭam anuyajamāno viriṣyate yajamānasya viriṣṭam anvṛtvijo viriṣyanta
GV02gopthbru:115: ṛtvijāṃ viriṣṭam anudakṣiṇā viriṣyante dakṣiṇānāṃ viriṣṭam anuyajamānaḥ putrapaśubhir
GV02gopthbru:116: viriṣyate putrapaśūnāṃ viriṣṭam anuyajamānaḥ svarge lokena viriṣyate svargasya lokasya
GV02gopthbru:117: viriṣṭam anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemo viriṣyate yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.13 //
GV02gopthbru:118: taṃ ha smaitam evaṃ vidvāṃsaṃ brahmāṇaṃ yajñaviriṣṭo vā yajñaviriṣṭino vety upādhāveran
GV02gopthbru:119: namas te astu bhagavan yajñasya no viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhehīti tad yatraiva viriṣṭaṃ syāt
GV02gopthbru:120: tatrāgnīn upasamādhāya śāntyudakaṃ kṛtvā pṛthivyai śrotrāyeti trir evāgnīn samprokṣati
GV02gopthbru:121: triḥ paryukṣati triḥ kārayamāṇam ācāmayati ca samprokṣati ca yajñavāstu ca samprokṣaty
GV02gopthbru:122: athāpi vedānāṃ rasena yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ saṃdhīyate tad yathā lavaṇena suvarṇaṃ saṃdadhyāt
GV02gopthbru:123: suvarṇena rajataṃ rajatena lohaṃ lohena sīsaṃ sīsena eṣv evam evāsya yajñasya viriṣṭaṃ
GV02gopthbru:124: saṃdhīyate yajñasya saṃdhitim anu yajamānaḥ saṃdhīyate yajamānasya saṃdhitim anv
GV02gopthbru:125: ṛtvijaḥ saṃdhīyanta ṛtvijāṃ saṃdhitim anu dakṣiṇāḥ saṃdhīyante dakṣiṇānāṃ saṃdhitim
GV02gopthbru:126: anu yajamānaḥ putrapaśubhiḥ saṃdhīyate putrapaśūnāṃ saṃdhitim anu yajamānaḥ svargeṇa
GV02gopthbru:127: lokena saṃdhīyate svargasya lokasya saṃdhitim anu tasyārdhasya yogakṣemaḥ saṃdhīyate
GV02gopthbru:128: yasminn ardhe yajanta iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.14 //
GV02gopthbru:129: tad u ha smāhātharvā devo vijānan yajñaviriṣṭānandānītpupaśamayeran yajñe prāyaścittiḥ
GV02gopthbru:130: kriyate 'pi ca yad u bahv iva yajñe vilomaḥ kriyate na caivāsya kācanārtir bhavati
GV02gopthbru:131: na ca yajñaviṣkandham upayāty apahanti punar mṛtyum apātyeti punar ājātiṃ kāmacāro
GV02gopthbru:132: 'sya sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān brahmā bhavati yasya caiva
GV02gopthbru:133: vidvān brahmā dakṣiṇataḥ sado 'dhyāste yasya caiva vidvān brahmā dakṣiṇata udaṅmukha
GV02gopthbru:134: āsīno yajña ājyāhutīr juhotīti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,1.15 //
GV02gopthbru:135: brahma ha vai brahmāṇaṃ puṣkare sasṛje sa khalu brahmā sṛṣṭaś cintām āpede kenāham
GV02gopthbru:136: ekenākṣareṇa sarvāṃś ca kāmān sarvāṃś ca lokān sarvāṃś ca devān sarvāṃś ca vedān
GV02gopthbru:137: sarvāṃś ca yajñān sarvāṃś ca śabdān sarvāś ca vyuṣṭīḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamāny
GV02gopthbru:138: anubhaveyam iti sa brahmacaryam acarat sa oṃ ity etad akṣaram apaśyad dvivarṇaṃ caturmātraṃ
GV02gopthbru:139: sarvavyāpi sarvavibhvayātayāmabrahma brāhmīṃ vyāhṛtiṃ brahmadaivataṃ tayā sarvāṃś
GV02gopthbru:140: ca kāmān sarvāṃś ca lokān sarvāṃś ca devān sarvāṃś ca vedān sarvāṃś ca yajñān sarvāṃś
GV02gopthbru:141: ca śabdān sarvāś ca vyuṣṭīḥ sarvāṇi ca bhūtāni sthāvarajaṅgamāny anvabhavat tasya
GV02gopthbru:142: prathamena varṇenāpasnehaś cānvabhavat tasya dvitīyena varṇena tejo jyotīṃṣy anvabhavat // GpBr_1,1.16 //
GV02gopthbru:143: tasya prathamayā svaramātrayā pṛthivīm agnim oṣadhivanaspatīn ṛgvedaṃ bhūr iti vyāhṛtir
GV02gopthbru:144: gāyatraṃ chandas trivṛtaṃ stomaṃ prācīṃ diśaṃ vasantam ṛtuṃ vācam adhyātmaṃ jihvāṃ

GV02gopthbru:348: mātrās tad yathaitat paurṇamāsīm aṣṭakām amāvāsyāṃ śraddhāṃ dīkṣāṃ yajñaṃ dakṣiṇās

GV02gopthbru:352: tān etenāsminn āpyāyayaty āpo 'mṛtaṃ puruṣo brahmāthāpriyanigamo bhavati tasmād vai

GV02gopthbru:360: āsarvamedhād ete kratava eta evāsya sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu deveṣu sarveṣu vedeṣu

GV02gopthbru:376: jāyamāno ha vai brāhmaṇaḥ saptendriyāṇy abhijāyante brahmavarcasaṃ ca yaśaś ca svapnaṃ ca krodhaṃ ca ślāghāṃ ca rūpaṃ ca puṇyam eva gandhaṃ saptamam /

GV02gopthbru:753: tad bheṣajaṃ yad bheṣajaṃ tad amṛtaṃ yad amṛtaṃ tad brahma sa vā eṣa pūrveṣām ṛtvijām
GV02gopthbru:754: ardhabhāgasyārdham itareṣām ardhaṃ brahmaṇa iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.4 //
GV02gopthbru:755: devāś ca ha vā asurāś ca saṃgrāmaṃ samayatanta tatraitās tistro hotrakā jihmaṃ pratipedire
GV02gopthbru:756: tāsām indra ucchāni sāmāni lulopa tāni hotre prāyacchad ājyaṃ ha vai hotur babhūva
GV02gopthbru:757: praugaṃ potur vaiśvadevaṃ ha vai hotur babhūva niṣkevalyaṃ neṣṭur marutvatīyaṃ ha
GV02gopthbru:758: vai hotur babhūva āgnimārutam āgnīdhrasya tasmād etad abhyastataram iva śasyate yad
GV02gopthbru:759: āgnimārutaṃ yasmād ete saṃśaṃsukā iva bhavanti yaddhotā potā neṣṭāgnīdhro mumohe
GV02gopthbru:760: vasīta tad brahmeyasām ivāsa tāsām ardhaṃ pratilulopa prathamārhaṇaṃ ca prathamapadaṃ
GV02gopthbru:761: caitad dakṣiṇāṃ caitat pariśiṣeded iti brāhmaṇam // GpBr_1,3.5 //
GV02gopthbru:762: uddālako ha vā āruṇir udīcyān vṛto dhāvayāṃcakāra tasya ha niṣka upāhito babhūva
GV02gopthbru:763: upavādād bibhyato yo mā brāhmaṇo 'nūcāna upavadiṣyati tasmā etaṃ pradāsyāmīti taddhodīcyān
GV02gopthbru:764: brāhmaṇān bhayaṃ bibheda uddālako ha vā ayam āyāti kaurupāñcālī brahmā brahmaputraḥ
GV02gopthbru:765: sa ūrdhvaṃ vṛto na paryādadhīta kenemaṃ vīreṇa prati saṃyatāmahā iti taṃ yata eva
GV02gopthbru:766: prapannaṃ dadhre tata evam anupratipedire taṃ ha svaidāyanaṃ śaunakam ūcuḥ svaidāyana
GV02gopthbru:767: tvaṃ vai no brahmiṣṭho 'sīti tvayemaṃ vīreṇa pratisayatāmahā iti taṃ yata eva prapannaṃ
GV02gopthbru:768: dadhre tata evam anupratipedire taṃ ha svaidāyanā ity āmantrayāmāsa sa ho gotamasya
